DataElement.preferredName: Joint Range of Motion Decreased Tender Painful Assessment Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the number of body joints evaluated to have limited and either tender or painful range of motion.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Joint Range of Motion Decreased Tender Painful Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Decreased joint flexibility._Discomfort elicited through touch or pressure._Causing physical or psychological misery, pain or distress._A measure of joint flexibility, range of motion is the normal range of movement for a joint, consisting of flexion, how far it can bend, and extension, how far it can stretch. It is usually measured by the number of degrees from the starting position of a segment to its position at the end of its arc._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredName: Tenderness Painful Range of Motion Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Discomfort elicited through touch or pressure.:Causing physical or psychological misery, pain or distress.:A measure of joint flexibility, range of motion is the normal range of movement for a joint, consisting of flexion, how far it can bend, and extension, how far it can stretch. It is usually measured by the number of degrees from the starting position of a segment to its position at the end of its arc.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Discomfort elicited through touch or pressure.
Causing physical or psychological misery, pain or distress.

A measure of joint flexibility consisting of flexion, how far it can bend, and extension, how far it can stretch. It is usually measured by the number of degrees from the starting position of a segment to its position at the end of its arc.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.:A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Copied from the CAP Protocol for use on forms.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Count of joints with limited
ReferenceDocuments.description: Count of joints with limited ROM and either tenderness or painful ROM without swelling or effusion

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI Center for Cancer Research clinical trial
